titleStmt.title: Ioy in tribulation. Or, Consolations for the afflicted spirits. By Phinees Fletcher, B.D. and minister of Gods Word at Hilgay in Norfolke
titleStmt.author: Fletcher, Phineas, 1582-1650.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed [by J. Beale] for Iames Baker, dwelling at the signe of the Marigold in Pauls Church-yard,

notesStmt.note: Running title reads: Consolations for the afflicted spirit.
"Apparently occasioned by the death of Sir Thomas Roberts."--Folger Shakespeare Library Catalogue.
Some print show-through; some pages stained.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.

place.placeName: the signe of the Marigold in Pauls Church-yard
